name: Don't Stop
description:
Don't Stop is a top-down 2D shooter that combines roguelite gameplay with a race against time survival experience.

Immerse yourself in a thrilling journey where every second counts. In this unforgiving world, you must navigate through intense challenges and make split-second decisions to stay alive within the given time constraints.

Face a variety of enemies and obstacles as you fight for survival. Utilize an arsenal of diverse firearms and weapon attachments to overcome them. Don't Stop offers a wide range of gun options, each with its unique characteristics and usage. Collect attachments to customize and enhance your weapons, adapting them to different combat scenarios and enemy types.

Every adventure is unique. Embracing roguelite mechanics, the game generates randomized maps and enemies, demanding your adaptability and tactical prowess. Moreover, you must strategically allocate your limited resources and time to find the best survival strategies.

Don't Stop is not just a test of reflexes in a shooting game. It thoughtfully incorporates the element of time, challenging your ability to manage stress and make critical decisions. As time relentlessly ticks away, each enemy you eliminate, each task you complete, and each new area you explore grants you precious additional time. However, hesitation and mistakes can rapidly accelerate the passage of time, pushing you towards desperation.

Are you ready to embrace the challenge of survival? Don't Stop awaits your courageous adventure. Let time stand still!
